error.message: Class Drupal\ext_redirect_sort\Plugin\views\field\WeightViewsField extends deprecated class Drupal\system\Plugin\views\field\BulkForm. Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\views\Plugin\views\field\BulkForm instead.

Call to method defineOptions() of deprecated class Drupal\views\Plugin\views\field\BulkForm. Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\views\Plugin\views\field\BulkForm instead.

Call to method buildOptionsForm() of deprecated class Drupal\views\Plugin\views\field\BulkForm. Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\views\Plugin\views\field\BulkForm instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.

Parameter $path_alias_manager of method Drupal\ext_redirect\Service\CurrentUrl::__construct() has typehint with deprecated interface Drupal\Core\Path\AliasManagerInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\path_alias\AliasManagerInterface.

Class Drupal\Tests\ext_redirect\Functional\ExtRedirectWebTestBase extends deprecated class Drupal\simpletest\WebTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead, use \Drupal\Tests\BrowserTestBase. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3030340. Replacement available from drupal:8.6.0.

Call to method setUp() of deprecated class Drupal\simpletest\WebTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead, use \Drupal\Tests\BrowserTestBase. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3030340. Replacement available from drupal:8.6.0.
Call to deprecated method assertArraySubset() of class PHPUnit\Framework\Assert: https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/issues/3494
Call to deprecated method assertArraySubset() of class PHPUnit\Framework\Assert: https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/issues/3494
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to ext_redirect.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
